title: Trump Tariffs: Here's What Gets More Expensive For American Consumers
content: President-elect Donald Trump has vowed to slap a 25% tariff on all goods imported from America's largest trading partners - Mexico and Canada, starting January 20, his first day in office.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump has vowed to slap a 25% tariff on all goods imported from America's largest trading partners - Mexico and Canada, starting January 20, his first day in office.

title: Meet Ananda Krishnan, Father Of Monk Son Who Gave Up $5 Billion Empire
content: Ananda Krishnan is one of Malaysia's most influential and wealthiest individuals. In the past week, Mr Krishnan, also known as AK, has been in the limelight because of his son Ajahn Siripanyo, who gave up the world's riches to become a Buddhist monk.

title: ISKCON A "Fundamentalist" Group: Bangladesh Government To Court
content: Bangladesh has called ISKCON, or the International Society for Krishna Consciousness, a "religious fundamentalist" group in an affidavit filed in that country's High Court.

title: Top 10 UK Lottery Winners Revealed After Rs 1800 Crore Jackpot
content: A UK resident recently won 177 million pounds (₹1804 crore) in EuroMillions, becoming the third-largest UK lottery winner. The biggest jackpot was 195 million pounds in 2022.

title: Trump Tariffs Are Latest Inflationary Pressure For US Lumber
content: US lumber prices, which already have risen in recent months due to lower production in Canada, could see further gains after President-elect Donald Trump's proposed tariffs on trade from north of the border.

title: Temple Attacked As Tensions Soar After Hindu Priest's Arrest In Bangladesh

title: Will Trump Overshadow Biden's Success In Sealing Israel-Lebanon Truce Deal?

title: Walmart Scales Back Diversity Push, Quietly Removes LGBTQ Merchandise

title: Why "Trump Guitars" Has A "Cease And Desist" Letter From Iconic Brand
content: Trump Guitars, whose website boasts a picture of the US president-elect holding a six-string, has received a "cease and desist" letter from Gibson, whose guitars have been favorites of musicians including Bob Dylan and Chuck Berry.

title: Prince Harry's Friend Talks About "Dysfunctional" Royal Family

title: People With Brain Injuries Have A High Risk Of Romance Scams: Report
content: Romance scams - where scammers create fake identities and use dating or friendship to get your trust and money - cost Australians A$201 million last year.
